thread.title: BRIEF-Appliance Recycling Centers Of America Says Co, Unit Entered Into Stock Purchase Agreement With ApplianceSmart

title: BRIEF-Appliance Recycling Centers Of America Says Co, Unit Entered Into Stock Purchase Agreement With ApplianceSmart

organizations.name: brief-appliance recycling centers of america says co
reuters) - appliance recycling centers of america inc

text:
40 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Appliance Recycling Centers Of America Says Co, Unit Entered Into Stock Purchase Agreement With ApplianceSmart Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 5 (Reuters) - Appliance Recycling Centers Of America Inc : 
* APPLIANCE RECYCLING CENTERS OF AMERICA INC - ‍ON DEC. 30, 2017, CO, UNIT OF CO ENTERED INTO STOCK PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH APPLIANCESMART HOLDINGS LLC 
* APPLIANCE RECYCLING CENTERS OF AMERICA INC - ‍CO SOLD TO APPLIANCESMART HOLDINGS LLC​ ALL THE STOCK OF APPLIANCESMART IN EXCHANGE FOR $6.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2qtIyKR ) Further company coverage:
